features.featureTitle: In the Routines page (RoutinesPage.tsx), add an image attachment feature to routine items. Each routine item should support attaching an image via two input options: (1) gallery/file upload (accept="image/*") and (2) camera capture (accept="image/*" capture="environment"). Display a thumbnail preview of the attached image on the routine item card. Store the image using the existing useImageStorage hook (IndexedDB imageBlobs table). Do not modify any existing routine item fields, drag-to-reorder, add/edit/delete, speech recognition, import/export, or tab-switching functionality.
